original_text: I will punish them very much because of the things that they have done. I will show them that I am very angry with them. When and I punish them as they deserve, they will know that I am the Lord. ’
korean_text: 분노의 책벌로 내 원수를 그들에게 크게 갚으리라 내가 그들에게 원수를 갚은즉 내가 여호와인 줄을 그들이 알리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: I will punish them very much
because of the things that they have done
I will show them that I am very angry with them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 내가 매우 분노하고 있음을 보이리라

sentences.original_text: When I punish them as they deserve
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들이 마땅히 받아야 할 대로 벌할 때

sentences.original_text: they will know that I am the Lord
